description: Finca Macaní is a permaculture-based farm in Sotaquirá, Boyacá, dedicated to food sustainability and community engagement. The initiative emphasizes working harmoniously with nature while promoting local trade and education. Visitors can participate in workshops, learn about traditional food practices, and experience the farm's diverse agricultural processes. Macaní aims to foster a deeper understanding of food production and its cultural significance, contributing to a more sustainable future for the community.
name: Finca Macaní
